channel.title: Random Coin Drops
channel.description:
I want random coin drops in my staffzone, so i added this: [code]drop = 995 2805 3183 999999999 1 0 coins drop = 995 2801 3180 999999999 1 0 coins drop = 995 2802 3173 999999999 1 0 coins drop = 995 2792 3179 999999999 1 0 coins drop = 995 2794 3176 999999999 1 0 coins drop = 995 2788 3179 999999999 1 0 coins drop = 995 2803 3188 999999999 1 0 coins drop = 995 2803 3195 999999999 1 0 coins drop = 995 2809 3187 999999999 1 0 coins drop = 995 2814 3183 999999999 1 0 coins[/code] in drops.cfg
But it doesnt work, anyone help me so it does work?
